IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO SERVE THE LA MILITARY DEPT. IN ITS EDUCATIONAL, MILITARY ENHANCEMENT & TRAINING MISSION.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO EXCLUSIVELY SUPPORT THE EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS AND MUSEUMS OF THE LOUISIANA NATIONAL GUARD AS WELL AS THE LOUISIANA NATIONAL GUARD'S MISSION, ITS MEMBERS, VETERANS, AND THEIR FAMILIES.
IRS990.Desc: SOLAR RESILIENCY PROJECT-PROVIDE POWER TO THE LOUISIANA MILITARY DEPARTMENT IN TIMES OF NATURAL OR MAN MADE DISASTERS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: COOPERATIVE ENDEAVOR AGREEMENTS - THE MILITARY DEPARTMENT, STATE OF LOUISIANA.RAIL CAR STORAGE - EAST CAMDEN: LEASE RAIL TRACK TO EAST CAMDEN AND HIGHLAND RAILROAD TO GENERATE FUNDS FOR THE LOUISIANA MILITARY DEPARTMENT, SPECIFICALLY CAMP MINDEN AND THEIR OPERATIONAL NEEDS.LEASE REVENUE - CAMP MINDEN: LEASE OLD BUILDINGS FOR THE BENEFIT OF CAMP MINDEN TO PROVIDE ADDITIONAL FUNDS TO LANG.LEASE REVENUE-CAMP VILLERE RANGE PROGRAM: NATIONAL AND LOCAL LAW ENFORCEMENT AGENCIES RENT THE RANGES FOR TRAINING. THIS PROVIDES FUNDING FOR CAMP VILLERE AND JACKSON BARRACKS PROJECTS.LEASE REVENUE-CELL TOWER LEASES: ALLOWS TELECOMMUNICATION COMPANIES TO LEASE SPACE AT LOCATIONS THROUGHOUT THE STATE. PROVIDES ADDITIONAL GRANT FUNDS FOR LANG PROJECTS.LEASE REVENUE-UPPER IOWA UNIVERSITY: ALLOWS UPPER IOWA UNIVERSITY TO LEASE SPACE AT JACKSON BARRACKS. PROVIDES ADDITIONAL GRANT FUNDS FOR LANG PROJECTS.LEASE REVENUE-EAGLE FEDERAL CREDIT UNION: ALLOWS EAGLE FEDERAL CREDIT UNION TO LEASE SPACE AT JACKSON BARRACKS. PROVIDES ADDITIONAL GRANT FUNDS FOR LANG PROJECTS.LEASE REVENUE-UPS MIDSTREAM SERVICES: ALLOWS UPS MIDSTREAM SERVICES TO LEASE SPACE AT JENA ARMORY. PROVIDES ADDITIONAL GRANT FUNDS FOR LANG PROJECTS.LEASE REVENUE - MOVIE AND TV FILMING. PROVIDES ADDITIONAL FUNDS FOR LANG PROJECTS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: BILLETING OPERATIONS: PROVIDED A PLACE OF LODGING FOR SERVICE MEN AND WOMEN FOR ACTIVE/INACTIVE DUTY TRAINING, AS WELL AS MORALE, WELFARE, AND RECREATION. DURING FISCAL YEAR ENDED 2023, THERE WERE THREE BILLETING OPERATION LOCATIONS.JACKSON BARRACKS: APPROXIMATELY 4,000 SERVICE MEN AND WOMEN SERVEDCAMP BEAUREGARD: APPROXIMATELY 2,000 SERVICE MEN AND WOMEN SERVEDCAMP MINDEN: APPROXIMATELY 500 SERVICE MEN AND WOMEN SERVED

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: LANG EMERGENCY RELIEF FUNDSCHOLARSHIP PROGRAMFRIENDS OF THE MUSEUMCAMP VILLERE RANGE PROGRAMCAMP BEAUREGARD HOUSING PROGRAMESLER AIR FIELD PROGRAM

Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE A, PART II, LINE 10, EXPLANATION FOR OTHER INCOME:

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ACCOUNTING STANDARDS PROVIDE DETAILED GUIDANCE FOR FINANCIAL STATEMENT RECOGNITION, MEASUREMENT, AND DISCLOSURE OF UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS RECOGNIZED IN AN ENTITY'S FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THESE STANDARDS REQUIRE AN ENTITY TO RECOGNIZE THE FINANCIAL STATEMENT IMPACT OF A TAX POSITION WHEN IT IS MORE LIKELY THAN NOT THAT THE POSITION WILL NOT BE SUSTAINED UPON EXAMINATION. AS OF JUNE 30, 2023, MANAGEMENT OF THE ORGANIZATION BELIEVES THAT IT HAS NO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS THAT QUALIFY FOR EITHER RECOGNITION OR DISCLOSURE IN THE CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. TAX YEARS ENDING JUNE 30, 2020 AND LATER REMAIN SUBJECT TO EXAMINATION BY THE TAXING AUTHORITIES.

GRANTS - WE REQUIRE THE GRANTEE TO FILL IN A GRANT REQUEST FROM THAT DETAILS THE NEEDS, JUSTIFICATION AND THE REQUIRED AMOUNT OF THE GRANT. WE THEN RECEIVE UPDATES EVERY TWO MONTHS REGARDING THE USE OF THE FUNDS AND PROGRESS OF THE PROJECTS FOR WHICH THE FUND WERE DESIGNATED. SCHOLARSHIPS - AWARDED TO GRADUATES OF THE YOUTH CHALLENGE PROGRAM WHO SEEK ASSISTANCE IN FURTHERING THEIR EDUCATION AT THE TRADE SCHOOL,VOCATIONAL, TECHNICAL, COMMUNITY COLLEGE OR UNIVERSITY LEVEL. REPORTS ARE SENT BACK TO THE FOUNDATION FROM THE POST YCP DIRECTORS ON THE PROGRESS OF THE GRADUATES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 8B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THERE ARE NO COMMITTEES WITH AUTHORITY TO ACT ON BEHALF OF THE GOVERNING BODY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE TREASURER PRIOR TO FILING. AFTER FILING, A COPY IS PROVIDED TO EACH BOARD MEMBER.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: PRIOR TO ANY BUSINESS DEALING, THE BOARD IS MADE AWARE OF ANY POTENTIAL CONFLICT. DURING THE PRIOR FISCAL YEAR THERE WERE NO CONFLICTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DATA WAS GATHERED FROM GUIDESTAR AS TO ORGANIZATION BUDGET SIZE, GEOGRAPHICAL LOCATION, AND TYPE OF ORGANIZATION TO DETERMINE THE COMPENSATION FOR THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 18
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL INFORMATION IS AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE BY REQUEST.
